## CommonPickerCssClasses interface

Shared css classes for all pickers

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CommonPickerCssClasses 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [nextPeriod?](./datetime.commonpickercssclasses.nextperiod.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Element used for switching period to next one |
|  [periodData?](./datetime.commonpickercssclasses.perioddata.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Element wrapping displayed period data |
|  [periodDatum?](./datetime.commonpickercssclasses.perioddatum.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Element representing single datum for period item |
|  [periodSelection?](./datetime.commonpickercssclasses.periodselection.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Period selection element wrapping displayed period and previous, next buttons |
|  [periodValue?](./datetime.commonpickercssclasses.periodvalue.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Element representing currently displayed period |
|  [previousPeriod?](./datetime.commonpickercssclasses.previousperiod.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Element used for switching period to previous one |
